    public class HairDryerInboundPort
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractInboundPort
implements HairDryerUserCI
    The class HairDryerInboundPort implements an inbound port for the HairDryerUserCI component interface.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants
